tag_narrative: Promote peaceful and inclusive societies for sustainable development, provide access to justice for all and build effective, accountable and inclusive institutions at all levels
Significantly reduce all forms of violence and related death rates everywhere
title_narrative: Contribution to the OSA-AICMA program “Victim Assistance in Colombia 2021-2022”
Contributo al programma OSA-AICMA “Assistenza alle vittime in Colombia 2021-2022”
sector_narrative: Removal of land mines and explosive remnants of war
description_narrative: The proposal aims to mitigate the impact of anti-personnel mines and other explosive devices on Colombian territory, through actions seeking to support the physical rehabilitation, vocational training and the implementation of micro-projects for the creation of livelihoods for landmine victims, their families and communities.

La proposta mira a mitigare l’impatto delle mine anti-uomo e altri ordigni esplosivi sul territorio colombiano, attraverso azioni di supporto alla riabilitazione fisica, formazione professionale e la realizzazione di micro-progetti per la creazione diei mezzi di sussistenza per le vittime di incidenti provocati da mine, le loro famiglie e le comunità.
